benefits.title: Benefits of Blood Donation
benefits.description: Donating blood is not only beneficial for those who receive it. Donors can also enjoy many advantages, such as:
benefits.freeHealthCheckUp.title: Free Health Check-Up
benefits.freeHealthCheckUp.description: In order to give blood, you're required to undergo a health screening. A trained staff member performs this checkup. They'll check your: pulse, blood pressure, body temperature, hemoglobin levels
benefits.improvedCardiovascularHealth.de: Donating blood can help reduce harmful iron stores. This can reduce the risk of heart disease. It can also reduce the risk of heart attack.
benefits.emotionalSatisfaction.title: Emotional Satisfaction
benefits.emotionalSatisfaction.descripti: Donating blood can help you feel good about yourself. It can also help you feel more connected to your community.
benefits.reducedRiskOfCancer.title: Reduced Risk of Cancer
benefits.reducedRiskOfCancer.description: Donating blood can help reduce the risk of cancer. This is because it can reduce the risk of iron overload in the body.
criterias.title: Eligibility Criteria for Blood Donation
criterias.ageAndWeight.title: Age and Weight
criterias.ageAndWeight.description: Donors must be between 18 and 65 years old and weigh at least 50 kg.
criterias.generalHealth.title: General Health
criterias.generalHealth.description: Be in good general health and not suffering from any diseases transmissible by blood.
criterias.donationFrequency.title: Donation Frequency
criterias.donationFrequency.description: Men can donate every three months, and women every four months.
hero_description: Blood donation is a crucial act that saves lives daily. A single donation can help up to three people and is used in various medical situations, from surgeries to cancer treatments. By donating regularly, you play a vital role in maintaining a healthy blood supply for your community.

metadata.title: tabarro3 - Give Blood, Save Lives
metadata.description: Give blood, save lives. Learn about the benefits of blood donation, eligibility criteria, and find donation centers near you. Join us in making a difference!
metadata.keywords: blood donation, blood donation platform, blood donation benefits, blood donation eligibility, blood donation centers
